title: The Warm Duo
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Haaah, my breath is so white.... It’s freezing, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ayumu-san, your neck seems cold. If you’d like, you can use my muffler....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eh? No, I can’t! If I do, then you would be cold, Dia-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Don’t worry about me. Please use it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>T-, thank you very much.... It’s warm!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, I’m glad<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Umm, I don’t know if this is a good substitute, but please use this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>A hand warmer? I’m fine, please keep it with you, Ayumu-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Umm.... Then, how about we hold hands and have the hand warmer between us? That way we can both be warm<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Thank you, Ayumu-san. Then let’s do that. Fufu, it’s been a long time since I walked hand in hand with someone other than Ruby<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
